# Documentation Templates

This directory contains standardized templates for common documentation patterns in the SocleStack project.

## Available Templates

| Template | Purpose |
|----------|---------|
| [COMPONENT_README_TEMPLATE.md](./COMPONENT_README_TEMPLATE.md) | Standard format for component directory READMEs |

## Usage

1. Copy the relevant template to your target location
2. Fill in all required sections (marked in the template)
3. Remove optional sections that don't apply
4. Delete any template usage notes or instructions

## Template Standards

All templates follow these conventions:

- **Markdown format** with consistent heading levels
- **Code examples** in TypeScript/TSX with syntax highlighting
- **Tables** for structured information (contents, dependencies)
- **Consistent section ordering** for easy navigation

## Contributing New Templates

When adding new templates:

1. Use descriptive filenames with `_TEMPLATE.md` suffix
2. Include usage instructions at the end (to be removed when used)
3. Mark required vs optional sections
4. Add the template to the table above
5. Follow existing formatting conventions
